nodes.text: Xi Char Cathedral factories were located on Xi Char and owned by the Xi Charrian. Precision manufacturing was considered an act of religious worship in the factories. This faith practice was followed by thousands. These initiates were not concerned with what use their creations would see, allowing the Charrian to be pawns of the Trade Federation.

Variable Geometry Self-Propelled Battle Droid, Mark Is, also known as vulture droids, needed very specialized manufacturing, like the manufacturing in the cathedral factories. Accordingly, the vulture droid was constructed in the factories.
